thread.section_title: Play-Asia.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Play-Asia.com | www.play-asia.com | 13 of 325
thread.title: Kcalb Tsap-Eloh

author: Kcalb Tsap-Eloh
title: Kcalb Tsap-Eloh
text:
I used this site for buying some Nintendo eShop digital cards. On mobile at least, I overlooked the small text box that indicated that they were out of stock for UK codes. The refund process was smooth and speedy. I later bought some Japanese region codes and quickly received the info in a link sent via email.
Would purchase from here again, for sure! The responsive and human responses won over my loyalty.
